entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Content-Length not appended when using JsonContent #82984
  • [mono][interp] "Arg storage type not yet supported" on specific P/Invoke method signature #82976
  • Provide ALC name in DispatchProxy for proxies in custom ALC #82969
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ConcurrentDictionary<TKey, TValue>.TryExchange #82968
  • [wasi] Failing test - `System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.XsdDataContractExporterTests.ExporterTypesTests.TypesTest_Negative` #82967

Closed

  • Dotnet stopped working on Arm64 based Rockchip RK3566 #82672
  • Failed to read NuGet.Config due to unauthorized access. #81619
  • System.Drawing.Common no longer cross-compatible - stalling migration to .net 7 #80837
    Future
  • ExecutionManager::GetRangeSection performs a linear search over list of loaded assemblies #8393
    Future
  • Not able to serialize Geometry with System.Text.Json #82870

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono][jit] Use an mrgctx for all gshared methods. #82981
    NO-REVIEW
  • Add support for Inline TLS field access in JIT #82973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow multiple EventCounters sessions and make sure EventListners always send a Disable command #82970
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Clean up run.sh documentation #82983
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix invariant check in DateTimeParse #82971
    area-System.Globalization
  • Remove missing link #82972
    area-Meta
  • [mono] Fix Hello World sample. #82977
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Enable JitDasmWithAlignmentBoundaries and JitDasmWithAddress in Release #82666
  • Add RID for Fedora 39 #82185
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Fix the multicore performance of mapping from an instruction pointer to a MethodDesc #79021
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Improve jiterpreter trace entry point selection heuristic #82604
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Trim some overheads for "r"/"o" DateTime parsing #82925
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Fixes for partial compilation of methods #80635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add NT_SIGINFO NOTE to ELF dumps #82449
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement Test Process Watcher #78742
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Try to untangle the rid calculation. #82832
    community-contribution
  • JIT: Expand runtime lookups in a late phase #81635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow devirtualizing more interface calls #82927
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • CoreCLR support for InlineArrayAttribute. (struct layout part) #82744
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Add System.Globalization.Native builds for iOS-like platforms #82393
    os-ios, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [jiterp] Adjust jiterpreter thresholds to exercise it more on CI #82476
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [wasi] More cross compiler fixes. #82911
  • eng/SourceBuild.props: when unset, let the repo determine RuntimeOS. #82546
    community-contribution
  • JIT: Assume allocations succeed #82961
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support WindowStyle without UseShellExecute #82662
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Avx512 extract most significant bits #82731
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [JIT] Fixed improper peephole zero-extension removal when cdq/cwde instructions are involved #82733
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add IPAddress ISpanFormattable/Parsable implementations #82913
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/7.0] Do not use ALC name for AssemblyName in DispatchProxy #82807
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.x
  • JIT: initial implementation of profile synthesis #82926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Overflow check optimizations for division #82924
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [android][ios] Add LibraryBuilder task to support aot library mode #81919
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [IGNORE][wasi] Open PR to run *all* the tests #81649
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi
  • [JIT] X86/X64 - Eliminate redundant 'cmp' instructions #82750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] new EmccAssertions and EmccEnvironment MSBuild props #82954
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [browser] wasm memory snapshot into browser cache #82049
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Add ICorProfiler API to allow profiler created providers to have a callback when a session enables them #80528
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Emit a null check when storing to valuetype fields. #82663
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [wasi] Fixes to enable more tests #82966
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
